text.section: No person shall leave this state or avoid service of process by any means whatever, so as to avoid being compelled to testify before any legislative committee or grand jury.
No person shall procure the absence of a witness for the purpose set out in subsection (1).

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4866a-1, 4866a-2.
